content:
Plan Your Knowledge Base in Lightning Experience

It's essential that you consider your individual company’s needs while developing a strategy for capturing and publishing your support team’s expertise. With a robust knowledge base, customers receive service faster or even solve their own issues.

Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Editions with Service Cloud.

Types of articles and information to include:

* Set up and configure Lightning Knowledge
* Considerations for Lightning Knowledge:
	+ Record Type
	+ Page Layout
	+ Custom Fields on Articles
* Who can write the articles?
* Who needs access to read the information?

Considerations:

* Categorize your information: Work with Data Categories, Data Category Visibility
* Enhance search: Improve the Article Search Experience, Enable Topics for Articles
* Workflow or approval processes for article creation and publication: Workflow and Approvals for Articles, Validation Rules
* Import existing information into Salesforce Knowledge
* Support multiple languages
* Share knowledge externally through Help Center
* Follow articles in Chatter

Tips:

* Create synonym groups in Salesforce Knowledge
* Plan data categories carefully
* Create custom reports on Salesforce Knowledge data
* Avoid accidental data loss when editing articles
* Review usage regularly to avoid storage shortages
* Public knowledge base users cannot rate articles
* Salesforce Files allows agents to attach documents to articles
* Do not convert custom fields into other field types
* Renaming Salesforce Knowledge labels note standard field names are fixed
* The Salesforce Knowledge search engine supports lemmatization

Knowledge Base Allocations by Edition:

* Essentials: 500 articles, 10 versions per article, 1 language
* Professional: 500 articles, 10 versions per article, 1 language
* Enterprise: 50,000 articles, 10 versions per article, 5 languages
* Developer: 50,000 articles, 10 versions per article, 5 languages
* Unlimited: 150,000 articles, 10 versions per article, 10 languages

You can ask Salesforce Support to increase the article limits if needed.
title: Plan Your Knowledge Base in Lightning Experience
